subject: Nutrition
title: Banned Substances in Sports
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Banned Substances in Sports.

hook.text: About 15% of supplements sold to athletes contain substances that would cause a failed drug test.

buildup.text: WADA bans hundreds of substances including steroids, EPO, stimulants, and hormone precursors.

discovery.text: Cross-contamination in factories means legal products can contain trace amounts of banned drugs.

twist.text: Olympic athletes have lost medals after testing positive from contaminated supplements they thought were safe.

climax.text: Athletes must use third-party tested productsâ€”NSF or Informed Sport certifiedâ€”to protect their careers.

punchline.text: An innocent supplement can end an athletic career.
